title: Shipping & Returns
shippingPolicy1: We are excited to get your new bike to you! We offer complimentary standard shipping on all bike orders across Europe.
shippingPolicy2: Processing Time: Orders are typically processed and packed within 1-2 business days.
shippingPolicy3: Shipping Time: Standard shipping usually takes 3-5 business days to arrive after dispatch.
shippingPolicy4: Tracking: You will receive a tracking number via email as soon as your order has been shipped, allowing you to follow your package's journey to your doorstep.
returnPolicy1: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not happy with your bike, we offer a 30-day return policy.
returnPolicy2: Eligibility: To be eligible for a return, your bike must be in the same unused condition that you received it, with all original parts, accessories, and packaging.
returnPolicy3: Process: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team at contact@radanor.bike with your order number. We will provide you with instructions on how to proceed.
returnPolicy4: Refunds: Once your return is received and inspected, we will process your refund. The credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment within 7-10 business days.
